abstract: Off-duty New York City police officer shoots and kills Delrawn Small during traffic dispute in Brooklyn; authorities are investigating and have yet to release officer's name.
lead_paragraph: The authorities were still trying to determine what prompted the killing, which happened early on Monday in the Cypress Hills neighborhood.

headline.main: Off-Duty Officer Fatally Shoots Man in Brooklyn Traffic Dispute
headline.print_headline: Officer Driving Home From Work Kills Man Who Attacked Him in a Traffic Dispute

snippet: The authorities were still trying to determine what prompted the killing, which happened early on Monday in the Cypress Hills neighborhood....

keywords.value: Isaacs, Wayne (New York, NY, Police Officer)
keywords.name: persons
